## StreamSyncOpts.src property

Either an array or object of input streams / subscribables. If the latter, the object keys are used to label the inputs, else their `id` is used as label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
src: ISubscribable<A>[] | IObjectOf<ISubscribable<A>>;
```
